Detailed Description

SCI/UART interface.

This interface relies on avr-libc. It binds the compile-time configured UART to stdin and stdout, allowing the user to read/write data over the serial line using printf and similar calls.

Author:
Stefan Filipek
Date:
March 2009

Get a character from the UART queue.

Blocking Function - Get next char on the RxBuffer

void SCI_Init ( void   ) 

Initialize the SCI.

This must be called to initialize the SCI and bind stdin and stdout to the serial port.
